content:
I downloaded the zip file for Pset 3 and then did problem zero setting up the list from the string provided, but when I uncomment the appropriate lines and run it I keep getting this error: FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'tests/student_tests/hello_world.txt'.

Similarly, when I run the tester I get this error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'document_distance'.

I have tried closing Spyder and opening it again, and restarting the kernel but none of them fix the problem. I saved the files the same way I saved Pset 1 and 2 and I had no issues with those. Everything is in the same directory, so I don't know what the problem could be.
subject: Error Running Pset 3 tester

content:
There should be at least 3 things in the directory that has the file ‘document_distance.py’ in it.

1) the document_distance file
2) the tester file
3) a folder called ‘tests’ which has the different wordlists we use

Can you make sure you have all three of these? If not, consider re-downloading the pset. If the problem persists, please come to Office Hours and talk to a TA
